sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Stim Jim is a Trandoshan brand of jerky sold globally and manufactured by Conagrassk Brands. They are widely available in stores and markets, typically found near the cashier. Stim Jim's don't need to be refrigerated, and keep for years before spoiling. It takes a maneuver to eat the Stim Jim and when consumed, it allows the character to recover 1 wound or 1 strain. They make a pleasing "snap" sound when bitten into.</description> <encumbrance>0</encumbrance> <hard_points>0</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Stim Jim</name> <number>GEAR0001182</number> <price>5</price> <range/> <rarity>10</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_class_name>x_176383_star_wars_gear</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-01-15 22:00:17</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a2cb81282f3d6010e0f497eef699b6b2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-01-15 22:00:17</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
